name: gemini-cli-integration
description: Production-tested guide for using Google Gemini CLI as a coding assistant within Claude Code workflows. Provides `gemini-coach` command-line wrapper and `/ask-gemini` slash command for getting second opinions, architectural advice, debugging help, code reviews, and security audits from Geminis 1M+ context window. Use when: Need second opinion on architectural decisions, stuck debugging after 2+ attempts, writing security-sensitive code (auth, payments, data handling), planning large refactors (5
